alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 03 at 3:47PM PST until December 03 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of higher terrain above about 5500 feet in far eastern Klamath County and western Lake County. This includes Highway 31 along the Summer Lake Basin. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are still gusting to 50 mph at Summer Lake which is prompting the extension of this advisory. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
